living_situation: Lives with her husband in a cozy bungalow in South Yarmouth, MA
family_summary: Married for over 50 years with two grown children and three grandchildren who visit often
communication_style: Prefers face-to-face communication with a personal touch, values clear explanations and written summaries
primary_motivation: Staying healthy to enjoy quality time with her grandchildren and continue her passion for gardening
barriers: Mobility issues due to osteoarthritis and stress related to balancing work and health appointments
support_system: Her husband, children, and a close-knit group of friends from a local book club
